title: JSON schema for Visual Studio's file nesting feature

addedExtension.description: If this exist, files with an additional extension should nest under file without additional extension. Example: file.html.css nest under file.html

pathSegment.description: If this exists, files with "extra" extension part in the file name should nest under files without it, but having same name and last extension. Example: file.min.js nest under file.js.

add.description: Add nesting rules in the order to be applied by corresponding provider, where each rule entry has a form 'child: collection of potential parents'.

remove.description: Remove specified nesting rules if they are merged from higher level nesting settings.

extensionToExtension.description: Nest files with specific extensions under other specific extensions

add.description: Add nesting rules in the order to be applied by corresponding provider, where each rule entry has a form 'child: collection of potential parents'.

remove.description: Remove specified nesting rules if they are merged from higher level nesting settings.

fileToFile.description: Nest specific file names under other specific file names

add.description: Add nesting rules in the order to be applied by corresponding provider, where each rule entry has a form 'child: collection of potential parents'.

remove.description: Remove specified nesting rules if they are merged from higher level nesting settings.

fileSuffixToExtension.description: Nest files with specified suffixes under files with specified extensions.

add.description: Add nesting rules in the order to be applied by corresponding provider, where each rule entry has a form 'child: collection of potential parents'.

remove.description: Remove specified nesting rules if they are merged from higher level nesting settings.

allExtensions.description: A greedy version of 'extensionToExtension' and has * as the only child key

add.description: Add nesting rules in the order to be applied by corresponding provider, where each rule entry has a form 'child: collection of potential parents'.

remove.description: Remove specified nesting rules if they are merged from higher level nesting settings.

root.description: Determines if this is the root nesting config file and no further inheritance is required.

dependentFileProviders.description: Contains a collection of nesting rule providers specified in the order to be applied.
